scripts.build:frontend: npm run build:shell && npm run build:micro-frontends
scripts.build:micro-frontends: npm run build:auth && npm run build:tenant && npm run build:file && npm run build:user && npm run build:workflow && npm run build:dashboard
scripts.test:frontend: npm run test:shell && npm run test:micro-frontends
scripts.test:micro-frontends: npm run test:auth && npm run test:tenant && npm run test:file && npm run test:user && npm run test:workflow && npm run test:dashboard
scripts.lint:frontend: npm run lint:shell && npm run lint:micro-frontends
scripts.lint:micro-frontends: npm run lint:auth && npm run lint:tenant && npm run lint:file && npm run lint:user && npm run lint:workflow && npm run lint:dashboard
scripts.analyze:bundles: npm run analyze:shell && npm run analyze:micro-frontends
scripts.analyze:shell: cd micro-frontends/shell && npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist
scripts.analyze:micro-frontends: npm run analyze:auth && npm run analyze:tenant && npm run analyze:file && npm run analyze:user && npm run analyze:workflow && npm run analyze:dashboard
scripts.analyze:auth: cd micro-frontends/auth-micro-app && npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist
scripts.analyze:tenant: cd micro-frontends/tenant-micro-app && npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist
scripts.analyze:file: cd micro-frontends/file-micro-app && npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist
scripts.analyze:user: cd micro-frontends/user-micro-app && npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist
scripts.analyze:workflow: cd micro-frontends/workflow-micro-app && npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist
scripts.analyze:dashboard: cd micro-frontends/dashboard-micro-app && npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:bff
scripts.install:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run install:micro-frontends
scripts.install:micro-frontends: npm run install:shell && npm run install:auth && npm run install:tenant && npm run install:file && npm run install:user && npm run install:workflow && npm run install:dashboard
scripts.install:bff: npm run install:auth-bff && npm run install:tenant-bff
